document.full_text: a former manager at one of california's two nuclear power stations sued the facility's operators on wednesday, claiming he was fired in retaliation for reporting safety concerns at the plant.
document.title: whistleblower suit filed against california nuclear plant
lines_and_colors: a former manager at one of california's two nuclear power stations sued the facility's operators on wednesday, claiming he was fired in retaliation for reporting safety concerns at the plant.
